Class EarthServerGenericClient.AxisLabels

AxisLabels
Defined in: SceneModules.js.

Class Summary
Constructor Attributes Constructor Name and Description
 
EarthServerGenericClient.AxisLabels(xSize, ySize, zSize)
This class generates labels for each axis and side (except bottom) of the bounding box.

Defines the color of the text.
<inner>

Defines the size of the font.
<inner>

Array stores all text nodes of the x-axis.
<inner>

Array stores all text nodes of the y-axis.
<inner>  
textNodesZ
Array stores all text nodes of the z-axis.
<inner>  
transforms
Array stores all X3DOM transform nodes.

Class Detail
EarthServerGenericClient.AxisLabels(xSize, ySize, zSize)
This class generates labels for each axis and side (except bottom) of the bounding box.
Parameters:
xSize
The width of the bounding box.
ySize
The height of the bounding box.
zSize
The depth of the bounding box.
Field Detail
<inner> fontColor
Defines the color of the text. Default at start: emissiveColor attribute is set, the diffuseColor one isn't.
Default Value:
"0.7 0.7 0.5"
<inner> fontSize
Defines the size of the font. Value is always positive!
Default Value:
50.0
<inner> textNodesX
Array stores all text nodes of the x-axis.
Default Value:
Empty
<inner> textNodesY
Array stores all text nodes of the y-axis.
Default Value:
Empty
<inner> textNodesZ
Array stores all text nodes of the z-axis.
Default Value:
Empty
<inner> transforms
Array stores all X3DOM transform nodes. Each transform contains the shape, material, text and fontStyle node.
Default Value:
Empty
Method Detail
changeColor(color)
This function changes the color of each label independent of its axis.
Parameters:
color
This parameter changes the current color value of each label. It expects a string in x3d color format. E.g. "1.0 1.0 1.0" for white and "0.0 0.0 0.0" for black.
changeFontSize(size)
This function changes the text size of each label independent of its axis.
Parameters:
size
The parameter (positive value expected) represents the desired size of the font. Remember, the parameter represents the size in x3dom units not in pt like css. Hence the size value could be large.
changeLabelNameX(string)
This function changes the text of each label on the x-axis.
Parameters:
string
Defines the new text.
changeLabelNameY(string)
This function changes the text of each label on the y-axis.
Parameters:
string
Defines the new text.
changeLabelNameZ(string)
Parameters:
string
Defines the new text.
createAxisLabels(xLabel, yLabel, zLabel)
This function generates labels on all three axis (x,y,z). The labels will be added on each side (except bottom).
Parameters:
xLabel
yLabel
zLabel
<inner> createLabel(axis, side, label)
This (private) function creates the needed x3dom nodes.
Parameters:
axis
Which axis do you want? Available: x, y, z
side
Choose the side of the axis.
Available for x: front (default), back and top.
Available for y: front (default), back, left and right.
Available for z: front (default), back and top.
label
This text will appear at the given axis.
